price: Sila Rabbii gadittii manguddoota godhatanii? “Odoma isaan homaa hin qabneefi sammuus hin qabne (godhatanii?)” jedhi.
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
